txt.en:
'I believe that we can use the information Glorwen has provided us to cause dissent among the goblins and Orcs. If we can sow the seed of rage within the Orcs here, we might cause the goblins and Orcs to fall upon one another.

'To accomplish this, we will need to do something truly dangerous. I need you to bring me a sharp post.

'When I was brought here, I remember passing many lashed and bound posts stacked together in the tunnels above. Cut one of the posts free and bring it to me.'
'This will do just fine. Give me one moment....'
'Bring me one of the sharp posts from the lashed piles in the tunnels above.'
Not content to remain idle while in his cell, the Elf Aeglas has a plan to turn the tables against the goblins of Goblin-town.
Bring the sharpened post to Aeglas in his cell in the Goblin-town prison

Stacks of bound posts lie in the main tunnels of Goblin-town.\n\nAeglas believes that he can turn the Orcs and goblins against one another, but his plan requires that you collect a sharp post for him.
Collect a sharp post from the tunnels above the Goblin-town prison
